class.comment: Represents a NBT Tag for a standard @(wshort).

SELF_SIZE_IN_BYTES.comment: The size in bytes of a @(wshort) tag.

TYPE.comment: The type of tag this class represents.

data.comment: The value of this tag as an short.

params.name: data

return.comment: A new @(wshort) tag with the given value.
